casebody.data:
Freda HUGHES, Administratrix of the Estate of Thomas J. Hughes, Deceased, Appellant, v. Deane SCAG, Appellee. No. 10528. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Dec. 15, 1947. Effler, Eastman, Stichter & Smith, of Toledo, Ohio, for appellee.

Before SIMONS, MARTIN, and Mc-ALLISTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The above cause coming on to be heard upon the transcript of record, the briefs of the parties, and oral argument of counsel in open court, and the court being duly advised in the premises, now, therefore, it is hereby ordered, adjudged, and decreed that the judgment of the district court be and is hereby affirmed.
